data.title: Change the language and region on iPhone
data.meta_description: You can change the language and region of your iPhone when you travel or move.
data.text:
Your preferred form of address. (Choose feminine, masculine, or neutral. Turn on Share with All Apps so all apps personalize how they address you. Available for some primary languages, for example, Spanish.)

Live Text (text you can select in images to copy or take action on).
